GitLab CE.description:
Git repository hosting and collaboration.

Based on the official docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/gitlab/gitlab-ce, available for amd64 architecture only.
GitLab CE.more_info:
Default username for your GitLab UI isrootand password is5iveL!fe

HTTPS is not enabled by defautt, please see: https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/omnibus-gitlab/blob/master/doc/settings/nginx.md#enable-https

443.description: GitLab WebUI port. Suggested default: 8443. Not enabled in docker image by default
443.label: HTTPS WebUI port

/etc/gitlab.description: Choose a Share for GitLab configuration. Eg: create a Share called gitlab-config for this purpose alone.
/etc/gitlab.label: Config Storage

/var/log/gitlab.description: Choose a Share for GitLab log files. Eg: create a Share called gitlab-logs for this purpose alone.
/var/log/gitlab.label: Config logs

/var/opt/gitlab.description: Choose a Share for GitLab repositories. Eg: create a Share called gitlab-repos for this purpose alone.
/var/opt/gitlab.label: Repository Storage
